title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A modern web application that helps users track personal income and expenses with visual analytics and interactive pie charts showing expense breakdown by category.
detailedDescription: Personal Finance Tracker is a comprehensive financial management application designed for individuals who want to monitor their spending habits and financial health. The app allows users to input income and expenses, categorize transactions, and view detailed analytics through interactive pie charts and graphs. Key features include real-time expense tracking, income management, visual analytics with Chart.js, dark/light mode toggle, and responsive design for desktop and mobile devices. The application helps users understand their spending patterns, set financial goals, and make informed financial decisions.
outcomes: Modern, user-friendly web application with current best practices in frontend development, data visualization, and responsive design. Demonstrates full-stack development capabilities and modern web development practices.

title: Fitness Class Scheduler
description: A modern Angular SSR application for planning weekly fitness classes with dark mode, responsive design, and client-side persistence.
detailedDescription: Fitness Class Scheduler is a web application designed for fitness instructors and gym owners to manage and schedule weekly fitness classes. The app allows users to add, edit, and remove fitness classes with specific days and times, view schedules in both table and card layouts, and manage class information efficiently. Key features include server-side rendering for fast loading and SEO optimization, dark mode with user preference saving, responsive design for all devices, LocalStorage persistence for data retention, and smooth animations for enhanced user experience. The application is built with Angular 20 and TypeScript for type safety and maintainability.
outcomes: Fast, SEO-friendly SSR Angular application with a clean UX, responsive design, and persistent schedule management.

title: Habit Tracker & Streak Counter
description: A Progressive Web App (PWA) for tracking daily habits and building momentum through streak counting with comprehensive analytics and visual charts.
detailedDescription: Habit Tracker & Streak Counter is a comprehensive productivity application designed to help users build and maintain positive daily habits. The app allows users to create custom habits, track daily completion, and visualize progress through streak counting and analytics dashboards. Key features include habit creation and management, automatic streak calculation, comprehensive analytics with Chart.js visualizations, data persistence using LocalStorage, Progressive Web App capabilities with offline support, glass morphism design elements, and responsive design for all devices. The application helps users stay motivated by providing visual feedback on their progress and maintaining momentum through streak tracking.
outcomes: Modern React PWA with data visualization, responsive design, and excellent UX demonstrating proficiency in modern React development, PWA implementation, and user-friendly interface design.

title: Event Countdown Timer
description: A feature-rich countdown timer web application for creating and managing multiple countdowns for various life events with recurring events and smart notifications.
detailedDescription: Event Countdown Timer is a comprehensive time management application designed to help users track and celebrate important life events. The app allows users to create unlimited countdowns for birthdays, anniversaries, graduations, and custom events with automatic yearly repetition. Key features include multiple countdown views (list and individual), recurring events with daily/weekly/monthly/yearly intervals, visual customization with color coding and themes, smart notifications with confetti animation and audio alerts, LocalStorage data persistence, and URL sharing for specific countdowns. The application is built with vanilla JavaScript for optimal performance and includes modern browser APIs for enhanced functionality.
outcomes: Lightweight, fast-loading vanilla JavaScript application demonstrating modern web development best practices without frameworks, featuring responsive design, browser APIs integration, and excellent performance.

title: Travelogue - Travel Storytelling Website
description: A comprehensive travel platform featuring interactive world maps, travel stories, destination exploration, and responsive design for travel enthusiasts.
detailedDescription: Travelogue is a comprehensive travel platform designed for travel enthusiasts who want to explore destinations, read travel stories, and discover new places. The website features an interactive world map with clickable destination markers and popups, allowing users to explore different locations and read detailed travel experiences. Key features include a hero section with call-to-action, masonry-style photo grid with lightbox modal for full-size image viewing, blog-style layout showcasing travel stories, interactive world map using Leaflet.js and OpenStreetMap, personal bio and mission statement, dark/light theme toggle with LocalStorage persistence, and responsive design for all devices. The platform serves as both a travel blog and destination discovery tool.
outcomes: Modern, scalable travel website with excellent performance, user experience, and maintainability. Demonstrates proficiency in React development, interactive maps integration, responsive design, and modern web development practices.

title: Rasoha Academy - School Website
description: A modern, responsive website for a private school in Narok, Kenya, providing comprehensive information about programs, events, and resources for students and parents.
detailedDescription: Rasoha Academy website is the official online presence for a private school located in Narok, Kenya, designed to provide comprehensive information for students, parents, and the community. The website serves as a central hub for school information, featuring detailed pages about academic programs, school history and mission, upcoming events and announcements, photo gallery showcasing school activities, contact information and location details, downloads section for forms and documents, and FAQ section for common questions. Key features include Progressive Web App (PWA) capabilities for offline access, SEO optimization for better search visibility, responsive design for all devices, and modern web technologies for fast loading and excellent user experience.
outcomes: Fast, accessible, and SEO-optimized school website with high performance scores, excellent user experience across all devices, and comprehensive PWA features demonstrating modern web development best practices.

title: Attendance System - Full Stack Application
description: A resilient attendance management system architected for educational institutions to automate attendance tracking, provide comprehensive analytics, and generate detailed reports. The system handles 500+ active users across multiple institutions with 95% accuracy improvement and 70% reduction in administrative overhead.
detailedDescription: A resilient attendance management system architected for educational institutions to automate attendance tracking, provide comprehensive analytics, and generate detailed reports. The system handles 500+ active users across multiple institutions with 95% accuracy improvement and 70% reduction in administrative overhead. The architecture follows a three-tier design: React frontend, Node.js/Express API layer, and MongoDB database. Service isolation is achieved through Express route middleware, separating authentication, attendance tracking, and reporting logic. Database operations use MongoDB transactions for atomic updates, with connection pooling preventing connection exhaustion. The system supports multi-institution deployment through organization-scoped data isolation, with MongoDB indexing optimizing query performance for large datasets.
outcomes: 95% improvement in attendance tracking accuracy with automated systems, 70% reduction in administrative time through streamlined workflows. Comprehensive analytics and reporting capabilities with 15+ report types. Vision includes scaling to 10,000+ users through MongoDB sharding, Redis caching, and microservices extraction for analytics and notifications.

title: E-Learning Platform - Full Stack Application
description: A resilient, scalable learning management system architected to handle thousands of concurrent students and hundreds of courses. The platform enables educational institutions to deliver online education at scale with sub-2-second page loads, comprehensive course management, and real-time progress tracking.
detailedDescription: A resilient, scalable learning management system architected to handle thousands of concurrent students and hundreds of courses. The platform enables educational institutions to deliver online education at scale with sub-2-second page loads, comprehensive course management, and real-time progress tracking. The system follows a layered architecture with Django REST Framework backend and React frontend. PostgreSQL serves as the primary relational database with optimized indexes. Django ORM uses select_related and prefetch_related to minimize database roundtrips. Service isolation is achieved through Django's app-based architecture, where course management, user authentication, and progress tracking are separated into distinct modules. The architecture supports horizontal scaling through Django's stateless design and PostgreSQL read replicas.
outcomes: Platform handles 10,000+ students and 500+ courses with consistent sub-2-second page load times. Stress-tested to handle 1,000+ concurrent users with 99.9% uptime. Optimized database queries reduce load times by 70% compared to baseline implementations. Vision includes scaling to 100,000+ students through Redis caching, CDN integration, and microservices extraction.

title: TaskForge - Modern Task & Project Management Platform - Full Stack Application
description: A resilient, scalable real-time collaborative project management platform designed for engineering teams. The system handles concurrent collaboration across distributed teams, managing project workflows, task coordination, and team communication with sub-second latency and conflict-free synchronization.
detailedDescription: TaskForge is a resilient, scalable real-time collaborative project management platform designed for engineering teams. The system handles concurrent collaboration across distributed teams, managing project workflows, task coordination, and team communication with sub-second latency and conflict-free synchronization. The platform supports real-time collaboration with sub-500ms latency and handles 100+ concurrent users per project without performance degradation. The architecture follows a microservices-inspired design with clear service boundaries, MongoDB for primary database with optimized indexing, pub-sub pattern via Socket.io for event distribution, and horizontal scaling through stateless API servers and MongoDB replica sets. Components are isolated through service boundaries, ensuring API failures don't block WebSocket communication, with automatic reconnection logic and exponential backoff for network resilience.
outcomes: Production-ready platform with 99.9% uptime, comprehensive error handling, and graceful reconnection strategies. Demonstrates enterprise-grade reliability with real-time collaboration capabilities, fault tolerance, and graceful degradation. Vision includes horizontal scaling to 10,000+ concurrent users through Redis pub-sub, read replicas, and CDN integration.

title: Banking System
description: A console-based Banking System built in Java to demonstrate core Object-Oriented Programming principles (Encapsulation, Inheritance, Abstraction, Polymorphism).
detailedDescription: A simple, console-based Banking System implemented in pure Java (no external APIs, no DB, no frameworks). It demonstrates core OOP principles through account operations and customer management. Features include creating customers, opening savings/checking accounts, depositing, withdrawing, transferring, and viewing balances and transactions.
outcomes: Clean OOP design showcasing encapsulation, inheritance, abstraction, and polymorphism; fully offline and lightweight; ideal for demonstrating problem-solving and software design skills.

title: EduChain - Blockchain Certificate Management
description: A resilient, decentralized certificate management system architected on Web3 principles, issuing verifiable academic certificates as ERC721 NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain. The platform enables educational institutions to issue tamper-proof, blockchain-verified certificates while providing students with permanent, verifiable proof of achievements through hybrid storage (MongoDB + IPFS + Blockchain).
detailedDescription: EduChain is a resilient, decentralized certificate management system architected on Web3 principles, issuing verifiable academic certificates as ERC721 NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain. The platform enables educational institutions to issue tamper-proof, blockchain-verified certificates while providing students with permanent, verifiable proof of achievements through hybrid storage (MongoDB + IPFS + Blockchain). The architecture follows a hybrid storage design: React 19 frontend with RainbowKit for wallet connection, Node.js/Express backend for certificate management, MongoDB for efficient querying, IPFS (via Pinata API) for decentralized metadata storage, and Ethereum blockchain (Sepolia testnet) for immutable certificate verification. Smart contracts use OpenZeppelin v5 ERC721 standard with ReentrancyGuard protection. Service isolation is achieved through separate layers: frontend wallet interactions are isolated from backend API calls, IPFS operations are handled asynchronously, and database operations use MongoDB transactions for atomic batch operations.
outcomes: Secure, decentralized solution for certificate management with instant verification capabilities. Uses OpenZeppelin audited patterns for security, includes dual storage (MongoDB for queries, IPFS for metadata, Blockchain for verification), and demonstrates production-grade Web3 architecture. Vision includes multi-chain deployment (Polygon, Arbitrum), certificate revocation mechanism, and enterprise features like institution-specific smart contracts.

title: LedgerX - Finance Management Application
description: A resilient, multi-tenant finance management platform architected to handle invoice processing, payment tracking, and financial analytics for businesses at scale. The system features hybrid database architecture (PostgreSQL + MongoDB), real-time data synchronization, and comprehensive analytics with complete data isolation across organizations.
detailedDescription: LedgerX is a resilient, multi-tenant finance management platform architected to handle invoice processing, payment tracking, and financial analytics for businesses at scale. The system features hybrid database architecture (PostgreSQL + MongoDB), real-time data synchronization, and comprehensive analytics with complete data isolation across organizations. The platform follows a hybrid database architecture with PostgreSQL (via Prisma ORM) for transactional financial data and MongoDB (via Mongoose) for append-only activity logs. The backend uses NestJS modular architecture with feature-based modules. Multi-tenant isolation is enforced at the database query level, ensuring all operations are scoped to organization IDs. Real-time updates are achieved through TanStack Query's refetch intervals (10-30 seconds) without WebSocket overhead.
outcomes: Multi-tenant architecture supports multiple organizations with complete data isolation and role-based access control. Features 20+ API endpoints, dual-database architecture for optimal performance, 100% TypeScript coverage for type safety, and automatic data refresh intervals (10-30 seconds) for near-real-time updates. Vision includes scaling to 1,000+ organizations through PostgreSQL read replicas, Redis caching, and microservices extraction.

title: OpsFlow
description: A production-ready incident and operations management platform architected for engineering teams, combining incident response, workflow management, task coordination, and knowledge sharing into a single secure team-based system. The platform features dual-database architecture (PostgreSQL + MongoDB), real-time WebSocket updates, and team-based multi-tenancy with 50+ API endpoints.
detailedDescription: OpsFlow is a production-ready incident and operations management platform architected for engineering teams, combining incident response, workflow management, task coordination, and knowledge sharing into a single secure team-based system. The platform features dual-database architecture (PostgreSQL + MongoDB), real-time WebSocket updates, and team-based multi-tenancy with 50+ API endpoints. The system follows a dual-database architecture: PostgreSQL (via Prisma ORM) for structured relational data (incidents, workflows, teams) and MongoDB for append-only event logs and timelines. The backend uses NestJS modular architecture with feature-based modules. Real-time updates are handled through WebSocket connections (Socket.IO) without background workers, computing SLA calculations and breach detection on-demand during API requests. Multi-tenant isolation is enforced at the database query level with team-scoped filtering.
outcomes: Production-ready system with 50+ API endpoints and real-time incident updates without paid infrastructure. Secure team-based multi-tenant architecture with complete data isolation, fully documented setup and deployment guides, and responsive UI across mobile, tablet, and desktop. Demonstrates enterprise-grade backend and system design skills with real-world SaaS architecture. Vision includes scaling to 1,000+ teams through PostgreSQL read replicas, Redis pub-sub for WebSocket message distribution, and microservices extraction.

title: SignFlow
description: A high-fidelity assistive technology platform architected for real-time sign language translation, exploring the architectural requirements for scaling accessibility platforms. The system features WebSocket-powered streaming, 3D avatar simulation with natural variation, and accessibility-first design with WCAG compliance, demonstrating production-grade architecture for specialized user bases.
detailedDescription: SignFlow is a high-fidelity assistive technology platform architected for real-time sign language translation, exploring the architectural requirements for scaling accessibility platforms. The system features WebSocket-powered streaming, 3D avatar simulation with natural variation, and accessibility-first design with WCAG compliance, demonstrating production-grade architecture for specialized user bases. The architecture follows a real-time streaming design: React frontend with Three.js (React Three Fiber) for 3D avatar rendering, Node.js/Express backend for translation processing, MongoDB Atlas for cloud-hosted data with indexed collections, and WebSocket connections for near-zero latency streaming. Animation pools store multiple variations per word/phrase, with seed-based selection for natural variation. Service isolation is achieved through separate layers: 3D rendering is isolated from translation processing, WebSocket connections are handled independently from REST API routes, and error handling is centralized with custom exception handlers.
outcomes: Fully implemented assistive technology prototype demonstrating real-time system design using WebSockets, scalable cloud architecture with MongoDB Atlas, intentional UX for specialized user bases, and product-level thinking bridging coding projects and viable market solutions. Features high-fidelity 3D avatar simulation, natural variation in animations, comprehensive analytics dashboard, and full WCAG accessibility compliance. Vision includes scaling to 10,000+ concurrent users through WebSocket load balancing, Redis for session management, and CDN integration for 3D assets.
